mehidi saukhya amathiwarayata jagath wishishtatha sammanaya pirinamanne da janadhipathithuma athini.thayilantha rajaye saukhya amathi pradit sintawanarol mahatha wishesha aaradhitha desuma pawathwana athara mahacharya diyanath samarasinha mahatha da mehidi desumak pawathwayi.dumkola nisa sama wasarakama lokaye miliyana 6ka janathawak miya yana athara me wyasanayata goduru wana loka janathawa in mudawa ganimata dumpanayata erehiwa loka saukhya sanwidhanaya lokaya pura kriyathmaka kara athi wada satahanata nayakathwaya laba dimedi sarthaka lesin ema wadasatahana meheya wu ratawala nayakayan thora me wishishtatha sammanaya pirinamima sidukarayi.me sammanaya mewara shri lankawa wenuwen saukhya amathi maithripala sirisena mahathata pradanaya kirima ee mahathata menma shri lankawata himiwuna gaurawayaki.loka saukhya sanwidhanaye pradhanathama ha mulikama karyabharayan athurin dumwati wirodhi satane di shri lankawa eyata honda wadapiliwelak yoda eya sarthakawa meheyawa thibe.
